trends: There have been 21 other sightings in Laredo
There were no other sightings in Laredo on or around August 26th 2011
Summary: noticed a cloud spun like a tornado sideways, walked outside to snap a picture
divs: sighting details8\23: opened window of hotel around 3 am and could see at a 36 degree angle, about 3 football fields away, there was a bright light with flashing lights and flying in no particular direction; very sporadic yet with precision. watched until 4:30 in the morning. 8\26: noticed an unusual cloud starting to form outside in the same location. picked up camera phone to take a picture. watch it for about 30 minutes and then went inside. . it was many months after this, looking through the pictures on my phone, that i noticed the objects in the swirl in the clouds.
